briefdescription.para: Taproot only; implied when sighash byte is missing, and equivalent to SIGHASH_ALL.
Bare scripts and BIP16 P2SH-wrapped redeemscripts.
Witness v0 (P2WPKH and P2WSH); see BIP 141.
Witness v1 with 32-byte program, not BIP16 P2SH-wrapped, key path spending; see BIP 341.
Witness v1 with 32-byte program, not BIP16 P2SH-wrapped, script path spending, leaf version 0xc0; see BIP 342.
Abort execution through assertion failure (for consensus code).
Just act as if the signature was invalid.

detaileddescription.para: Enum to specify what *TransactionSignatureChecker's behavior should be when dealing with missing transaction data.
All flags are intended to be soft forks: the set of acceptable scripts under flags (A | B) is a subset of the acceptable scripts under flag (A).

briefdescription.para: Hasher with tag "TapSighash" pre-fed to it.
Hasher with tag "TapLeaf" pre-fed to it.
Hasher with tag "TapBranch" pre-fed to it.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< unsigned char > &vchSig, script_verify_flags flags, ScriptError *serror)

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t leaf_version, std::span< const unsigned char > script)

memberdef.argsstring: (std::span< const unsigned char > a, std::span< const unsigned char > b)
memberdef.name: ComputeTapbranchHash

detaileddescription.para: Compute the BIP341 tapbranch hash from two branches. Spans must be 32 bytes each.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::span< const unsigned char > control, const uint256 &tapleaf_hash)
memberdef.name: ComputeTaprootMerkleRoot

detaileddescription.para: Compute the BIP341 taproot script tree Merkle root from control block and leaf hash. Requires control block to have valid length (33 + k*32, with k in {0,1,..,128}).
